bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of numerous forms of malign disease. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 7: 既覺脈及體內瘥，但 當勤服八風散，勿以脚未能行，輕加余治，未必全得要，更生諸惡，失 此諸治也 , “One may have the impression that the movement in the vessels and the situation in the body are all fine. Still one must regularly ingest the ‘powder for the eight winds’, and one must not carelessly add an additional treatment only bcause the legs cannot walk yet. This is to avoid that after one has done all that was necessary one still generates all types of malignity and the treatments initiated turn into a failure”.
